bug.author: CESARDELATORRE
bug.summary: Need to add description for each transformer in this page.
bug.description:
There's no a single explanation/description in this page. Each transformer should have a short description saying what it does. i.e. "What MaxAbsScaler does" This other page has the same issue: <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-automl-core/azureml.automl.core.constants.supportedtransformers?view=azure-ml-py>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-automl-core/azureml.automl.core.constants.supportedtransformers?view=azure-ml-py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CESARDELATORRE>@CESARDELATORRE</denchmark-link> Thanks for the feedback. We will update you shortly.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Aniththa>@Aniththa</denchmark-link> can you please check on this.
Worked with Aniththa and we improved the docs around transformers. Changes will appear in next SDK release in 1-2 weeks.
